urls.title: Petition: Ban the use of plastic packaging for all non-food items
urls.description: Plastic packaging is a global issue. Too many items are sold in non-recyclable, non-compostable plastic packaging. Alternatives such as paper and cardboard are perfectly viable for such items as children‚Äôs toys, tools, office equipment, mobile devices, clothes, electrical goods and so on.
